text:
Bug bounty programs are critical to improving the security of Bitcoin and other blockchain protocols.

That's why @WillSuttonCodes, @JEGamboaFuentes & I are building @LBounties for @_buildspace's @_nightsweekends s5 

Any feedback or input on this project is greatly appreciated! https://t.co/8KPVxaDBNS

user_info.name: MikeAbramo
user_info.description: If it’s not decentralized, it’s not crypto.
